function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disruption to construction projects due to covid-19 prevention measures and delays.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and legal challenges for construction entities due to prolonged disruptions and stricter prevention measures.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with safety steps, job-site hygiene, social distancing, and personal protective equipment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to cdc, osha, and state regulations and guidelines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to provide adequate site-specific safety plans","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workforce concerns about working in close proximity at the end of projects due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced workforce and site-supervision workers leading to increased risk of infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shrinking workforce crew size due to the pandemic leading to less group activities and more defined procedures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of worker protections such as sick leave and paid time off","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic difficulties caused by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New generation generation c emerging due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the application of sick leave policies for construction workers, especially those paid on a daily basis","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of construction workers from the formal economy from sick leave benefits, leading to vulnerability during disease outbreaks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased disease transmission due to shared housing arrangements for construction workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Workers being in close proximity to each other","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding open hotels","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of control over hotel cleanliness standards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Work suspensions, shut downs, or slowdowns due to covid-19 measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of on-site operations and increase in offsite construction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contracting at significantly lower margins and lack of in-depth investigation into bidding decisions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of parking around job sites in urban areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on demand for project types","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for healthcare facilities due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to coronavirus on construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased demand for construction projects due to unemployment and low growth","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Project delays due to pandemic and government-mandated closures, delays in shipments of materials and equipment, challenges finding workers, and smaller work crews due to social distancing requirements.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anticipation of future business impact, structural and financial.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longer project completion times due to safety changes, reduced on-site workforce, and time constraints for new construction projects.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of isolation and loneliness due to remote work and telecommuting practices","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of new technologies for real-time tracking of employee health and covid-19 symptoms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of remote management applications and technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential disruptions in lead times and prices for infrastructure and equipment due to the pandemic and closed international exchange markets.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of globally integrated supply chains due to reliance on single suppliers or vendors concentrated in one country or region.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential labor shortages in coastal us regions with shipping ports due to worker concerns about health and quarantine measures for incoming products.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in shipping containers from china","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shutdown of international suppliers and logistics companies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for distribution and warehouse space","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of worker protection and health-care facility concerns.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for conflicts and disputes in the construction industry leading to cost and schedule overruns.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disputes over direct vs. incidental impacts of the pandemic on project parties","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of changes in law on construction projects due to pandemic-related regulations","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in lien claims and related disputes in construction industry","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of insurance coverage for the pandemic","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Liquidity crises for construction firms with high debt and low cash revenues","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of coronavirus-related delays on tax incentives for projects","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive pandemic-related considerations in the paper","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on current covid-19 pandemic for research topics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organizational resilience in construction businesses","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to adapt to ongoing environmental disruptions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
